group_1.textLeft: (I don't have any proof...so I'll just@have to tell her how I feel!)
Senpai! I'm not the culprit after all!
Because I want to protect the school festival!

group_1.textRight: That's not proof of anything!

group_1.textLeft: You're right, there's no proof...
But, even if it was an "unconscious crime"@like you said earlier...
If I don't have any desire to stop the@school festival...
Do you still think I would still unconsciously@cause trouble?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...when you put it that way...
But, given the circumstances, you're suspicious...

group_1.textLeft: Just because I CAN do it, doesn't mean I DID do it.

group_1.textRight: I-indeed...!

group_1.textLeft: If you still doubt me...
Why did I try to cause trouble and cancel the@school festival?
I need you to show me proof...!

group_1.textRight: ...Your motive for causing trouble...and evidence...
I...can't come up with anything...
You even worked hard to solve the trouble...

group_1.textLeft: That's right.
Unless it was an accident...
Nobody would go around causing trouble and@then solve it themselves, would they?

group_1.textRight: You're right...
...My sincerest and deepest apologies for@suspecting you!

group_1.textLeft: As long as you understand, that's fine!
More importantly, we should work together@to find the culprit!

group_1.textRight: Tsumugi...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...Yukika-senpai?
Why are you here?

group_1.textRight: I felt that I should do a little investigating,@since there's been so much trouble...

group_1.textLeft: You're here to investigate too...

group_1.textRight: It's almost time for the patrolling teacher to@come out.
If he finds us here, I believe he may get angry...?

group_1.textLeft: That wouldn't be good...!
For now, let's go to a nearby park...!
Also...
We should call other Magical Girls...!

group_1.textRight: Call others...?

group_1.textLeft: I want us to solve this by tonight.
I don't want our preparations tomorrow to@be interrupted.
We don't want to be out too late, and the@more people we have, the better, right?

group_1.textRight: I agree.
We'll be constructing the stalls and the stage@tomorrow.
If trouble occurs then, it could become a@serious incident...
We have to prevent that before a disaster@happens...!

group_1.textLeft: I want to talk about the seeds, too.

group_1.textRight: The seeds?

group_1.textLeft: I'll tell you more when we're all together!
Ah, that's right...! How are we supposed to@get into the school...?

group_1.textRight: You can leave it to me, I have a way to sneak in.
